title: On the Evaluation of Speech Foundation Models for Spoken Language Understanding

abstract: The Spoken Language Understanding Evaluation (SLUE) suite of benchmark tasks was recently introduced to address the need for open resources and benchmarking of complex spoken language understanding (SLU) tasks, including both …
